title: Oke-Ode: Tragedy as Bandits Kill 15 Vigilantes, Hunters in Kwara
description: Bandits invaded the Oke-Ode community and killed 15 vigilantes and hunters in a violent attack.

title: BREAKING: Bandits Abduct Businessman In Midnight Attack On Kwara Community
description: Bandits carried out a midnight attack on a community in Kwara State, abducting a businessman.

title: NSCDC begins manhunt for attackers of Jigawa poly students
description: Attackers targeted students at a polytechnic in Jigawa State, prompting a manhunt by NSCDC.
